tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
At first i was very scared of undergoing the treatment of root canal and this was the fear factor which always stopped me from visiting a dentist. However after visiting the clinic the interaction with the doctor made my mind to go for the treatment. The way she explained the entire procedure and the awareness she gave me of ignoring the dental health made me realise the seriousness of my condition.
The line of medication and after treatment precautions was explained to me in a very crisp manner.
The proactive follow up by the doctor was really appreciated.
I fully recommend her without any hesitation.
Thanks
